step_1_context.text: This task is easier than the last one, but your explanation is clearer.

step_2_explanation.simple_rule: Use comparatives to compare two people, things, or ideas.
step_2_explanation.formula: short adj + er + than | more + long adj + than

step_3_interactive_exercises.question: Pick the correct comparative sentence.
options: Math is more easier than history.
step_3_interactive_exercises.explanation_for_failure: Use one comparative form only: easier, not more easier.

step_3_interactive_exercises.incorrect_sentence: This phone is more cheaper than mine.
step_3_interactive_exercises.corrected_sentence: This phone is cheaper than mine.
step_3_interactive_exercises.error_analysis: Cheap is a short adjective, so use 'cheaper', not 'more cheaper'.
